artist: Artist: After Nicholas Hilliard; Engraver: Thomas A. E. Chambars
description: half length portrait facing slightly left and looking at viewer; wearing jacket with high white lace ruff and hat in an oval composition
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

in plate in black: [ Vol. 1 p.148/NICHOLAS HILLIARD  T. Chambars sculp/ ætatis fuæ 30. 1577/ from a limning at Penshurst];  on sheet in pencil: [1-537/ This is the only engraved Portrait of the artist/ Bromleys\' Catalogue]
portfolio: From Anecdotes of Painting in England
title: Portrait of Nicholas Hilliard
